message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $120. I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $100 for it. Would you be able to accommodate this price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $120 is really the lowest I can go right now.  This product is in high demand and I'm confident it's worth the price.
